title: broadband download speed suddenly slowed
text:
I have the 350 broadband package and will typically get speeds over 350. I am testing using speedtest.net and using a wired connection.

Over the past couple of weeks my broadband speed has dramatically dropped. I am now struggling to get to 100mbps download - typically about 85. While I am still getting about 35 upload.

I have rebooted the router, reset the router and checked all the cables into the router. I have also done all of the network tests that virgin provides on its website.

I have a Hub3. A couple of connection logs at the bottom of this message.

I am unable to get through to anyone in VM due to the limitations on the call centres at the moment with CV19.

Thanks for your advice. David
